summary:
Revival of the Ciri DLC Armor:
This is the new conversion of the Ciri DLC Armor in UNP conversion by ViciousSARR and CBBE Bodyslide by Levionte. Includes also original VS Ciri DLC Armor conversion with original VS skirt and undershirt meshes/textures.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][size=6][size=5]MAY NOT BE UPLOADED TO ANY OTHER SITE FOR REDISTRIBUTION OR ALTERATIONS.
NO EXCEPTIONS.
[/size][b][u][size=5]USED BY PERMISSION OF CDPR FOR USE ON NEXUS ONLY!!![/size]
[/u][/b][size=4][/size][/size][/color]



[size=3][size=5]Revival of the Ciri DLC Armor:[/size]

This is the new Skryim conversion of the Ciri DLC Armor.
UNP conversion by ViciousSARR and CBBE Bodyslide by Levionte.
Includes also original VS Ciri DLC Armor conversion with original VS skirt and undershirt meshes/textures.

Armor will evntually be included with theÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68567]Cirilla (Ciri) Fiona Elen Riannon - Witcher 3 Voiced Follower[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/16520954]Levionte[/url].



[color=#ffff00][b]New UNP/CBBE Bodyslide[/b][/color] versions include original Vested Skirt meshes by MoogleOutFitters used by permission, with weightsliders by Levionte.
Main body armor and undershirt meshes property of CDPR.
Two versions of the armor: Skirted and Non-skirted with 2K Witcher diffuse and specular mapping.
There are four colour variants for each UNP and CBBE Bodyslide: Aqua, Grey, Original, and Ranger.

Additional colours may be added later. And some additional meshes for a later update to the project.


[color=#ffff00][b]
Original VS Ciri DLC[/b][/color] Armor is just the original mod I presented last year which was a conversion off Shockyy's 7base model. No updates have been made at this time. There is a newer version of it not yet completed. Includes the new UNP conversion with the original meshes/textures I made for the Vested skirts and undershirt. This was the version included originally with Levionte's Cirilla voiced follower of TW3.

The Original UNP can be used in game along with the new UNP version. The original will show up in the inventory under the title "VS Ciri DLC" to differentiate it from the new version. So you can use both if you want or just one.


All are craftable at forge, under leather. New UNP/CBBE listed as Ciri DLC. Original UNP listed as VS Ciri DLC.



[color=#ffff00][size=4]ENB USERS:[/size][/color]
My mods use cubemaps and speculars.
Not all ENBs handle cubemaps and speculars well.
Some ENBs will wash out a mesh with cubemaps and speculars.

If the textures are:
faded, shiny or glowing in your game,
or details seem to be lost,
if it looks anything perverse from my provided screenshots --------> it is your ENB.
Consult your ENB's mod page for a fix.
Screenshots take with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]Rudy ENB[/url].
[/size]
[size=4][size=5]
[color=#ffff00]SSE version is not coming for awhile. [/color][/size][color=#ffff00]
Please no requests for SSE. It will come eventually.[/color][/size]



[size=3][color=#3d85c6][size=5]INSTALL[/size][/color]
NMM, MO, or manual. Your choice.
[color=#3d85c6][size=5]

REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]
Skyrim original release.
[color=#6fa8dc][size=5]

[color=#3d85c6]RECOMMENDED[/color][/size][/color]
(These are recommended but not required to for the mods to work)

For the CBBE Bodyslide: NiOverride or Racemenu.
For the old UNP: HDT HEELS.


[color=#3d85c6][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/color]
The Ciri DLC original meshes and textures are the exclusive intellectual property of CD Projekt Red.
CDPR for their exclusive permissions to use Witcher 1, 2 and 3 assets.
MoogleOutFitters for the rigging and new skirt meshes on new UNP and CBBE files.
ViciousSARR UNP Conversion.
Levionte additional weighting and CBBE Bodyslide.
Old UNP version containing original skirt and undershirt meshes by ViciousSARR[/size][size=3]



[size=3][color=#3d85c6][size=5]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]
Translations welcome. Please contact me first.[/size]
[/size][/center][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size]
author: ViciousSARR and Levionte
